text: year. gss year respondent. id. respondent id number. ballot. ballot used interview. age. age respondent. childs. number children. sibs. number brothers sisters. degree. Rs highest degree. race. race respondent. sex. respondent's sex. region. region interview. income16. total family income. relig. rs religious preference. marital. marital status. padeg. fathers highest degree. madeg. mothers highest degree. partyid. political party affiliation. polviews. think self liberal conservative. happy. general happiness. partners. many sex partners r last year. grass. marijuana made legal. zodiac. respondents astrological sign. pres12. raw variable whether Respondent voted Obama. Recoded obama dataset. wtssall. weight variable. income_rc. Recoded income variable. agegrp. Age variable recoded age categories ageq. Age recoded quartiles. siblings. Top-coded sibs variable. kids. Top-coded childs variable. bigregion. Region variable (Census divisions) recoded four Census regions. religion. relig variable recoded six categories. partners_rc. partners variable recoded five categories. obama.
